comment: Shieldsmo, I've since changed the souring regimen, as kettle-souring can be kind of dodgy at best. Perform the mash steps, as directed in the recipe, and kettle sour with a 1/2 carton of Goodbelly Mango or unflavored probiotic, pitched at 120 degrees. Let the temp free-fall, and you should reach 3.6-3.2 in about 24-48 hours. Boil, cool, then pitch Sacc. Cheers!!!
